results.title: Cute Cat Live Print | Nursery Animal Prints | Scandinavian Nursery Wall Art | Baby Girl Nursery | Quote Printables | Cat Poster Art
results.description:
Cute Cat Live Digital Print for your child’s nursery or bedroom wall art. Perfect for a woodland or Scandi themed decor.


** Please note this listing is for a downloadable digital file that you can download and print yourself. No physical item will be shipped to you and no frames are included in the above prices **


This will make a great piece of art for the wall, or a great baby shower gift for a new baby.



~ HOW TO ORDER ~


1. Please choose the size of the print you want to order from the drop down menu. Please contact me to order an alternative size.

2. Please put your child’s name in the customised box and I will add this to the top and bottom of the design as shown in photo

3. Checkout and I will send your digital print to the email address you have registered with Etsy within 24 hours. (You will receive 1 high resolution PNG file. If you require any other size that is not listed, please just leave a note during checkout )



~ OPTIONS FOR PRINTING YOUR DIGITAL FILES ~


1. Print at home!

This is the quickest and easiest way to print your designs. You can use an inkjet or laser printer. Make sure to use a high quality paper for best results. Use matte cardstock for best results. Make sure you set your printing settings to high quality printing.


2. Print at your local print shop

UK suggestions:
Staples, Ryman, etc.

Just copy your file onto a USB flash and take it with you.

Other Suggestions:
Kinko's, Staples, Walgreen's or Cotsco.


3. Online Printing services

There are lots of places online to get prints:
Snapfish, iCanvas, mPix, Shutterfly, Vistaprint, CanvasPeople, Photobox.


Please note that all files purchased from my store are for personal use only and cannot be redistributed, edited or resold.

Thank you so much for visiting my shop! I hope you love your new prints!

results.description:
Machine Embroidered "Live Well, Laugh Often, Love Much" Design  on Cream or White Waffle Weave/Kitchen Decor

Need a gift for someone special in your life? Save Time by sending an item from my shop to the recipient.  Your item will arrive in an enclosed transparent see through poly bag and your gift note. (Be sure to include recipient's address and let me know what you want the gift note to say.) 

♦All my embroidery items are made with high quality embroidery thread on 100% cotton towels and they will look great for years.

Cream or White Waffle Weave Towel:
Each kitchen towel measures 16x28 inches.
CONSTRUCTION: 400 GSM 100% Pure 2 Ply Ringspun Cotton fabric. 

Fabric Care for Towel:
♦ Machine-wash in cold with like colors.
♦ Only non-chlorine bleach when needed.
♦ Tumble dry on low and remove promptly, lay flat to finish drying.
♦ Touch up with iron as needed.

♦NOTE:
Light creases, imperfections and nubs are characteristic of 100% cotton tea towels, waffle weave and flour sack towels.

For all listings: The colors within the embroidery designs, as well as the towel color itself, may vary slightly due computer screen color variations as well as different dye lots for the thread colors.

Handmade with care in a clean, perfume free, smoke free design studio in my home.

results.title: How To Get Thru Depression - Update October 2017
results.description:
How To Get Through Depression/A Quick Reference/Suggestion Guide

If you are feeling down and hopeless at times, be aware that you are not alone.  Everyone suffers periods of depression sometime during their lives.  For some, the down times are short-lived, for others...it takes years before there is any relief.

This small manual is a suggestion guide that will help you get through some difficult times.  I wrote this little book from my own experiences.

A combination of these tips will hopefully bring some relief.

Taking care of yourself is a life-long process.  The road to success has its obstacles, so don’t ever give up.

I wish you Peace, Hope and Love Always.

Sincerely,

Esther G. Monsalve
The Angel Shop


Update: October 7th, 2017

P.S.  Life is good…and then it gets better...and then...the best is yet to come.

Dear Reader, 

Please see a physician and/or healthcare professional BEFORE you try any of the suggestions listed.

Doctors, nurses, psychiatrists, psychologists, psychotherapists, school counselors who have the medical training, knowledge, formal education, experience, practice and above all...the sincere desire to help, support, care and love those in true need of healthy healing/living... please listen to them and follow their medical advice/prescriptions.  

Again...all of us have a purpose in life...and...taking good care of yourself is a life-long process.  Don't ever give up...no matter what. 

And, imagine in your mind to tell that inner/outer critic to go sit in the corner or side or hiding behind a desk of the room to just be quiet.

Thank you.

Esther Monsalve
The Angel Shop

Helpful Tips to Beat the Down Times

GET HELP – Call or visit a friend, relative, therapist or doctor.  Talking things out will relieve some of the suppressed anger or grief.  Your doctor might prescribe medication.  If so, follow his/her directions.  The numerous anti-depressants available now-a-days work wonders.

GET UP AND DO SOMETHING – Many people don’t want to do anything when they are depressed.  They don’t have the strength or desire to go out and be active.  This is an important time to take a walk (exercise will benefit you tremendously) and/or do some writing.

Take a nice warm bath with soothing music in the background.

Treat yourself to your favorite snack or meal.

Go outside or to the park and get some fresh air.  Take a moment and listen to the birds and wind (or traffic if you live in the city).  Take a deep breath and remind yourself that you will get through these difficult times.

WRITE -  Get a blank notebook or journal and write your thoughts and feelings.  If you don’t know what to say, doodle or draw.  Spend at least 25 minutes or longer writing.  Read it later.  Keeping a journal is an interesting way of expressing your feelings.  You don’t have to show the journal to anyone.

MAKE EXTRA MONEY -  If you like to make extra money, clean out your closets or garage.  Rent a booth at the local flea market and sell your unwanted items...these days, many internet websites can be another source of generating a few dollars.

You will meet people, make money and be doing something.  “One man’s trash is another man’s treasure.”  If you can make things, such as jewelry, stichery, candles or create art, selling your work is definetly a spirit lifter.

PRAY -  For those of you who believe in God, prayer is powerful.  It brings peace, hope and comfort.  Be patient and continue to ask for help.  In my opinion, you don’t have to go to church.  God is everywhere.  If you wish, read positive literature or listen to inspirational music. Always remember that God loves you.  Keep a reminder in your pocket or purse.

GIVE YOURSELF PERMISSION TO CRY – It is OK to release your emotions.  Express your feelings in a safe way and in a safe place….example: scream into a pillow, punch it or throw it across the room.

SEE A THERAPIST – Regular visits to a licensed professional who will support and help sort out your feelings is another tool to relieving depression.  They can give you many tools to help you get through your depression as well as provide insight and healthy options to help resolve your past and present issues.

IF POSSIBLE, GET A PET – A dog or cat gives unconditional love and he or she needs you just as much.  Studies show that owning a dog or cat reduces stress and….they are great, loyal companions.

GO TO THE LIBRARY – Read positive self-help books.  I recommend the book Feeling Good by David Burns and When I Say No, I Feel Guilty by Manuel J. Smith.  Research depression and its different types.  You will learn a great deal.

TALK TO YOURSELF IN THE MIRROR -  Some people find this odd but if you say positive things to yourself such as “You will be all right.”  “You are a wonderful person; hang in there”.  “I like you and I care what happens to you”, you will feel a difference.

NO ALCOHOL OR DRUGS -  Alcohol and/or drugs will bring temporary gratification, but that is NOT the answer.  It will only hurt you.  Please stay away from drugs and alcohol.

MAKE A WISH LIST -  Write down all the things you wish to do in life.  List the ones that sound reasonable and even those that might be impossible.  Make a promise to work on the ones that are attainable...for example:  Go back to school.  Change your career.  Exercise more.  Get your financial status up to date.  Find a new job.  Work on your relationships.  Take time out for yourself.

TAKE AN INFORMAL CLASS -   Your local college or University offers a variety of classes for those who wish to learn something new.  Take a class in creative writing, in arts and crafts or learn how to play the guitar.  A computer class will enhance your skills at work and at home.  A basic automotive class is extremely beneficial too.

SWIM, PLAY POOL OR GO TO A CONCERT -  Get out and have some fun.

RENT A Movie – Comedies are my favorites.  They get me laughing again.  Try it.

VOLUNTEER -  Help those who are less fortunate.  There are many centers that need your support….the homeless, an abused children's center, disabled individuals and the elderly.  Take time a few hours a week volunteering your assistance.

  DO SOMETHING YOU’VE NEVER DONE BEFORE -   Is there something in your life you have never done but always wanted to do?  Then...I suggest to try it.  I started selling my creative writing and arts and crafts at the flea market.  This boosted my self-esteem and brought me a little extra cash.  I also went camping with my daughter for the first time at age 40.  I loved it!

Follow your dreams.    

Esther Monsalve
The Angel Shop

Note: Please use MEMO, an editor writing software, in oder to open this digital file.

results.title: RTS 2/19 Live Laugh Love Sunflower one color Screen Print transfer
results.description:
11.5" wide
 
Screen print (one color plastisol ink) transfer - THIS IS NOT A DIGITAL FILE, you are purchasing a ready to apply print that will be shipped to you and you must apply it to your garment with a heat press
 
This is not a completed garment, shirt shown as an example only, this is ONLY the transfer to apply with your heat press to your own materials
Ships ready to apply to cotton, poly, or cotton poly blend fabrics
 
How To Apply Our Transfers Applying our transfers is super simple. Follow the steps and instructions below to achieve perfect results on your next project!
 
1) No Teflon Sheets, Covers or Pillows. Ever. Never use teflon sheets, covers or pillows with any of our plastisol formulas. They dissipate the heat too much, resulting in a poorly applied transfer.
 
2) Calibrate Your Heat Press. You will need to use a quality Infrared (IR) Temperature Gun (Contactless) to ensure your heat press is heating evenly and accurately. You should do this each and every time you start a new pressing cycle.
 
3) Pressure, Pressure, Pressure. Plastisol transfers will give you a quality and long-lasting decoration solution, but you HAVE to ensure you are using adequate and even pressure. This will ensure the formula properly adheres to your garment. Not using enough pressure can result in poorly applied plastisol transfers.
 
4) Water resistant, waterproof, and fireproof garments: We recommend testing a sample on your item before production. Water resistant, waterproof and fireproof garments may not accept a heat transfer application.
 
Athletic Formula NO TEFLON SHEETS, COVERS or PILLOWS
 
Temperature: 325 Degrees Fahrenheit  Time: 7 Seconds  Pressure: High Pressure (8-9 Manual, 60PSI Automatic)  Peel: Hot Peel

results.title: Live Laugh Love Crow Sticker, Aesthetic Sticker, Crow Sticker, Raven Sticker, Feminist Gifts, Cottagecore Sticker, Edgy Sticker, Mushroom
results.description:
Say it with me- LIVE! LAUGH! LOVE! and have mushrooms grow out of your mouth!


*Note about my stickers:

I print my stickers on extremely high quality material. The colors are vibrant, and the stickers are waterproof. You can use these as bumper stickers, laptop stickers, water bottle stickers, notebook stickers, ect. I wouldn't recommend dishwashing, just to be on the safe side. I try to keep them as affordable as possible while maintaining free shipping on top of a little higher than average production cost for stickers. Every sticker bought means a lot to me, so thank you so much for checking out my shop. :) Please let me know what you think, or if you have any suggestions for future stickers! 


Details:
3" x 2.98"
High Quality Material
White backing
Waterproof
Sustainably Packaged

**Who are you supporting when you shop from edouggieart?**

Hi! My name is Emelia. :) I am a one woman show based in Columbus, Ohio who has a passion for creation and sustainability. I have a background in traditional art/graphic design, and I am a UI/UX designer in my real life. I am inspired be nature, women, nostalgia, media, and juxtaposing two things that shouldn't really belong together but make something unique, beautiful, and/or cute. Running my shop has been one of my most fulfilling passions, and every purchase, review, heck even like or favorite means the world to me! It encourages me to create more art, and bring awareness to things I am passionate about like creating art that isn't just beautiful or cool, but also eco friendly. Thanks so much for checking out my shop! <3

results.title: Live, Laugh, Love Sculpture
results.description:
*CLEARANCE ITEM* (Orig. $86.00)

The source of the "Live, Laugh, Love" is Bessie Anderson Stanley's 1904 poem, "Success." Stanley originally submitted the work in an essay for Brown Book magazine that asked entrants to define success. 

"He achieved success who has lived well, laughed often, and loved much..."

The words have been put on everything from signs to mugs, but through the capabilities of 3d printing, now they've been fused together in one triple word tower! Each word is visible in profile from a different angle, rotated 60 degrees from each other. This concept is one of the reasons I got into 3D printing in the first place! Got an idea for your own 3-word combination? Let me know! Can be placed in front of a mirror to show off 2 words at the same time.

Printed in recyclable PLA, and mounted on a purple stained 3/4" wooden heart shaped base.

results.title: Live Laugh Love - Decal
results.description:
Vinyl Wall Decal Quote - Live Laugh Love  - Live Laugh Love  Wall Decal

*Matte removable wall vinyl*

MEASUREMENTS AVAILABLE

8" Tall x 10.7" Wide 
12" Tall x 16" Wide 
16" Tall x 21.4" Wide
20" Tall x 26.7" Wide

*Picture may not reflect true size.

Also our decals are available in other sizes. Please contact us if you need a special size. Please note that any changes of the decal dimensions will result in the price change. 

Choose the color from drop down menu or please leave us your color choice in the note to seller during purchase. 

WHAT YOU WILL RECEIVE

✓ Vinyl decal
✓ Step-by-step, easy to follow instructions on how to apply your decal

ADDITIONAL INFORMATION 

✓All of our designs are original and made with love in the USA.
✓We use high quality matte vinyl that looks great once applied to the wall.
✓Our decals will adhere to almost any smooth surface and slightly textured walls.
✓You can easly remove our decals from the wall without damaging the paint.
(you cannot reuse them).

RETURNS/EXCHANGES

We strive for five-star service and are committed to your satisfaction. I want all of my customers to enjoy their purchase. If you are not satisfied, I will be happy to provide you a full product refund (excluding shipping costs). Buyer is responsible for shipping costs to return purchased item in original condition.

Please note: All refund requests must be made within 24 hours of receipt. Requests after 24 hours will be denied. We will make every effort to correct any errors with your order for those requests submitted within 24 hours of receipt.

Unfortunately, we cannot be held liable for errors or delays as a result of a shipping provider. While we will make every effort to assist our customers in locating missing packages and reship items lost in the mail, the customer will be responsible for ALL shipping costs.

Please message me with any specific concerns or questions.

WHAT TO EXPECT

Your vinyl wall decal will arrive in mailing tube. Application instructions will be included. The decal comes in three layers: a backing paper, the vinyl decal and a transfer tape.

Using the transfer tape, the vinyl will be removed from the backing paper. The vinyl and transfer tape is rubbed firmly onto your wall. The transfer tape is then removed, leaving just the vinyl decal on your wall.

If you have any trouble installing your decal please contact us right away and we'll be more than happy to help.

See more of our designs at https://www.etsy.com/shop/GraphixExpressions
